subject: Programming
title: Imposter Syndrome
description: A quick, practical guide to Imposter Syndrome.

hook.text: You got the job, but you feel like a fraud. Someday they'll realize you don't belong here.

buildup.text: Imposter syndrome makes competent people feel undeserving. It's rampant in tech.

discovery.text: Studies show 70% of people experience imposter feelings. Senior engineers feel it just as much.

twist.text: The feeling never fully goes away. But knowing it's common and normal strips it of its power.

climax.text: The best antidote is sharing it openly. When one person admits it, others realize they're not alone.

punchline.text: Feeling like a fraud means you're still growing.

quiz.question: What percentage of people experience imposter syndrome?
